summary: KEY WILL NOT TURN IN THE IGNITION OF 2003 FOCUS. THE WHEEL IS NOW LOCKED AND I CAN'T DRIVE THE CAR. I'M PROBABLY GOING TO HAVE TO GET THIS TOWED AND PAY $200-$300 DOLLARS TO GET IT FIXED FOR WHAT SEEMS LIKE A SIMPLE PROBLEM AND I KNOW  THIS HAPPENS TO MANY OTHER FOCUS OWNERS. THIS IS NOT ACCEPTABLE BECAUSE I'M 6 MONTHS PREGNANT AND MY SAFETY IS AT ISSUE.  *NM
